verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'If <S%H3588><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon a land, <S%H776><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from among <S%H7097><s%> them and make <S%H5414><s%> him their watchman; <S%H6822><s%>

and he sees <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> coming <S%H935><s%> upon the land, <S%H776><s%> and he blows <S%H8628><s%> on the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> and warns <S%H2094><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>

then he who hears <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> and does not take <S%H2094><s%> warning, <S%H2094><s%> and a sword <S%H2719><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> and takes <S%H3947><s%> him away, his blood <S%H1818><s%> will be on his [own] head. <S%H7218><s%>

'He heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> but did not take <S%H2094><s%> warning; <S%H2094><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> will be on himself. But had he taken <S%H2094><s%> warning, <S%H2094><s%> he would have delivered <S%H4422><s%> his life. <S%H5315><s%>

'But if <S%H3588><s%> the watchman <S%H6822><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> coming <S%H935><s%> and does not blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> are not warned, <S%H2094><s%> and a sword <S%H2719><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> and takes <S%H3947><s%> a person <S%H5315><s%> from them, he is taken <S%H3947><s%> away in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> from the watchman <S%H6822><s%>'s hand. <S%H3027><s%>'

"Now as for you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I have appointed <S%H5414><s%> you a watchman <S%H6822><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so you will hear <S%H8085><s%> a message <S%H1697><s%> from My mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and give <S%H2094><s%> them warning <S%H2094><s%> from Me.

"When I say <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> 'O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, <S%H7563><s%> you shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%>' and you do not speak <S%H1696><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his way, <S%H1870><s%> that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> I will require <S%H1245><s%> from your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"But if <S%H3588><s%> you on your part <S%H859><s%> warn <S%H2094><s%> a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way, <S%H1870><s%> and he does not turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way, <S%H1870><s%> he will die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> your life. <S%H5315><s%>

"Now as for you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Thus <S%H3651><s%> you have spoken, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Surely <S%H3588><s%> our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> and our sins <S%H9128><s%> are upon us, and we are rotting <S%H4743><s%> away <S%H4743><s%> in them; how <S%H349><s%> then can we survive <S%H2421><s%>? "'

"Say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'As I live! <S%H2416><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'I take <S%H2654><s%> no <S%H518><s%> pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> but rather <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%> and live. <S%H2421><s%> Turn <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways! <S%H1870><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> then will you die, <S%H4191><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?'

"And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to your fellow <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5971><s%> citizens, <S%H5971><s%> 'The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> will not deliver <S%H5337><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his transgression, <S%H6588><s%> and as for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> he will not stumble <S%H3782><s%> because of it in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he turns <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness; <S%H7562><s%> whereas a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%> will not be able <S%H3201><s%> to live <S%H2421><s%> by his righteousness on the day <S%H3117><s%> when he commits <S%H2398><s%> sin. <S%H2398><s%>'

"When I say <S%H559><s%> to the righteous <S%H6662><s%> he will surely <S%H2421><s%> live, <S%H2421><s%> and he [so] trusts <S%H982><s%> in his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> that he commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> none <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of his righteous <S%H6666><s%> deeds <S%H6666><s%> will be remembered; <S%H2142><s%> but in that same iniquity <S%H5766><s%> of his which <S%H834><s%> he has committed <S%H6213><s%> he will die. <S%H4191><s%>

"But when I say <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> 'You will surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%>' and he turns <S%H7725><s%> from his sin <S%H9128><s%> and practices <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness, <S%H6666><s%>

[if a] wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> restores <S%H7725><s%> a pledge, <S%H2258><s%> pays <S%H9608><s%> back <S%H9608><s%> what <S%H1500><s%> he has taken <S%H1500><s%> by robbery, <S%H1500><s%> walks <S%H1980><s%> by the statutes <S%H2708><s%> which ensure life <S%H9132><s%> without <S%H1115><s%> committing <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> he will surely <S%H2421><s%> live; <S%H2421><s%> he shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>

"None <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of his sins <S%H9128><s%> that he has committed <S%H2398><s%> will be remembered <S%H2142><s%> against him. He has practiced <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> he will surely <S%H2421><s%> live. <S%H2421><s%>

"Yet your fellow <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5971><s%> citizens <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> 'The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not right, <S%H8505><s%>' when it is their own way <S%H1870><s%> that is not right. <S%H8505><s%>
"When the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> then he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in it.

"But when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7564><s%> and practices <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> he will live <S%H2421><s%> by them.

"Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> 'The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not right. <S%H8505><s%>' O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you according to his ways. <S%H1870><s%>"

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our exile, <S%H1546><s%> on the fifth <S%H2568><s%> of the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> that the refugees <S%H6412><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> "The city <S%H5892><s%> has been taken. <S%H5221><s%>"

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> upon me in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the refugees <S%H6412><s%> came. <S%H935><s%> And He opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> at the time <S%H5704><s%> [they] came <S%H935><s%> to me in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> so my mouth <S%H6310><s%> was opened, <S%H6605><s%> and I was no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> speechless. <S%H481><s%>
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> they who live <S%H3427><s%> in these <S%H428><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%> places <S%H2723><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Abraham <S%H85><s%> was [only] one, <S%H259><s%> yet he possessed <S%H3423><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> so to us who <S%H7227><s%> are many <S%H7227><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> has been given <S%H5414><s%> as a possession. <S%H4181><s%>'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "You eat <S%H398><s%> [meat] with the blood <S%H1818><s%> [in it,] lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> to your idols <S%H1544><s%> as you shed <S%H8210><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%> Should you then possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>?

"You rely <S%H5975><s%> on your sword, <S%H2719><s%> you commit <S%H6213><s%> abominations, <S%H8441><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> of you defiles <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's wife. <S%H802><s%> Should you then possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>? '"

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "As I live, <S%H2416><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> those who <S%H834><s%> are in the waste <S%H2723><s%> places <S%H2723><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and whoever <S%H834><s%> is in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> to the beasts <S%H9130><s%> to be devoured, <S%H398><s%> and those who <S%H834><s%> are in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> and in the caves <S%H4631><s%> will die <S%H4191><s%> of pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

"And I shall make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and a waste, <S%H4923><s%> and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> will cease; <S%H7673><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be desolate, <S%H8074><s%> so <S%H4480><s%> that no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> will pass <S%H5674><s%> through. <S%H5674><s%>

"Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and a waste <S%H4923><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed. <S%H6213><s%>"'

"But as for you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> your fellow <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5971><s%> citizens <S%H5971><s%> who talk <S%H1696><s%> about you by the walls <S%H7023><s%> and in the doorways <S%H6607><s%> of the houses, <S%H1004><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to one <S%H2297><s%> another, <S%H259><s%> each <S%H376><s%> to his brother, <S%H251><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Come <S%H935><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> the message <S%H1697><s%> is which comes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>'

"And they come <S%H935><s%> to you as people <S%H5971><s%> come, <S%H3996><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you [as] My people, <S%H5971><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> your words, <S%H1697><s%> but they do not do <S%H6213><s%> them, for they do <S%H6213><s%> the lustful <S%H5690><s%> desires <S%H5690><s%> [expressed] by their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> [and] their heart <S%H3820><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gain. <S%H1215><s%>

"And behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are to them like a sensual <S%H5690><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> by one who has a beautiful <S%H3303><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> and plays <S%H5059><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> on an instrument; for they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words, <S%H1697><s%> but they do not practice <S%H6213><s%> them.

"So when it comes <S%H935><s%> to pass <S%H935><s%> – as surely <S%H2009><s%> it will – then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> in their midst. <S%H8432><s%>"
